title: Alabama’s DMV Shutdown Has Everything to Do With Race (ACLU - American Civil Liberties Union) ...
text: ( Source : ACLU - American Civil Liberties Union ) Don't believe a word of it: It's all about race. Despite state officials' quick denial that the closing of 31 Alabama DMVs has nothing to do with race, it is a fact that the closures - mostly
